---
title: "Supplementary Materials for 'XyZ'"
author: "Hornsey and colleagues (2024)"
date: "2024-01-08"
output: html_document
---

```{r ech=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
dat_sleep = readxl::read_excel("FINAL_combined DISCA UR extraction spreadsheet_15-01-2024.xlsx",
                             sheet = 1) %>%
  filter(!is.na(author))

names(dat_sleep)[which(names(dat_sleep) == "factor")] <- "old_fact"
names(dat_sleep)[which(names(dat_sleep) == "NEW FACTOR (homogeneised)")] <- "factor"
```

```{r}
dat_errors = metaumbrella::view.errors.umbrella(dat_sleep)
```

```{r, eval=FALSE}
res = metaumbrella::umbrella(dat_sleep, mult.level=TRUE)
summary(res)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
downloadthis::download_this(
  dat_errors,
  output_name = "errors",
  output_extension = ".xlsx",
  button_label = "Download error/warninga",
  button_type = "warning",
  has_icon = TRUE,
  icon = "fa fa-save"
)
```
